overview: Special topics may be offered from time to time which reflect the interests of visiting members of staff in the areas of general management, international management, marketing, finance and organisational behaviour.
ilo: extend their knowledge of the special topic in management through the independent study of books and articles dealing with theory and practice in the area;
apply the knowledge and skills obtained through the study of this subject to problems and issues arising in organisations and work situations.
